title: So Jillian - for the win
description:
Another candid conversation between Jillian and the team on life, love, fitness, and more. Caller questions and emails get addressed on hot health topics and more!


This Week's Sponsors...

Brooklinen.com and use promo code JILLIAN for $20 and FREE shipping.
